attributes.action: Fund more support for armed forces veterans when they leave
attributes.additional_details: We think it is clear that veterans feel let down on a wide range of areas including housing, healthcare, employment, mental health, accident and injury.
attributes.background: We are calling for the government to fund more support for armed forces veterans when they leave the military, particularly in relation to their recovery from accident and injury and the Armed Forces Compensation Scheme.
